datasetParam.name: snp_id
datasetParam.help: Input a comma delimited set of SNP ids, or upload a file

stringParam.name: MinPercentKnowns
stringParam.help: Only return SNPs where the number of strains with coverage (see the Read frequency threshold parameter) is greater than or equal to this percentage

stringParam.name: MinPercentPolymorphisms
stringParam.help: Only return SNPs where the percent of non-major alleles (excluding unknowns) is greater than or equal to this percentage

enumParam.name: ReadFrequencyPercent
enumParam.help: At a SNP location, consider a strain to have coverage only if its major allele is this percent of the read calls.

stringParam.name: minor_allele_max
stringParam.help: Upper Bound on the frequency of strains that have the minor allele

stringParam.name: minor_allele_min
stringParam.help: Lower Bound on the frequency of strains that have the minor allele

stringParam.name: major_allele_max
stringParam.help: Upper Bound on the frequency of strains that have the major allele

stringParam.name: major_allele_min
stringParam.help: Lower Bound on the frequency strains that have the major allele

stringParam.name: min_strain_count
stringParam.help: Minimum number of strains for which there is a sequence call at this position

stringParam.name: set_a_count
stringParam.prompt: Minimum number of isolates in Set A with same allele >=
stringParam.help: Lower Bound on the number of isolates in set A that have the same allele at any SNP position. Note: for the highest confidence SNPs, this number should be equal to the number of isolate identifiers in set A.

stringParam.name: set_b_count
stringParam.prompt: Minimum number of isolates in Set B with same allele >=
stringParam.help: Lower Bound on the number of isolates in set B that have the same allele at any SNP position. Note: for the highest confidence SNPs, this number should be equal to the number of isolate identifiers in set B.

stringParam.name: set_a_percent
stringParam.prompt: Minimum percentage of isolates in Set A with same allele >=
stringParam.help: Lower Bound on the percentage of isolates in set A that have the same allele at any SNP position. Note: for the highest confidence SNPs, this percentage should be 100.

stringParam.name: set_b_percent
stringParam.prompt: Minimum percentage of isolates in Set B with same allele >=
stringParam.help: Lower Bound on the percentage of isolates in set B that have the same allele at any SNP position. Note: for the highest confidence SNPs, this percentage should be 100.

datasetParam.name: isolate_set_a
datasetParam.help: input a comma delimited set of isolate ids, or upload a file.

datasetParam.name: isolate_set_b
datasetParam.help: input a comma delimited set of isolate ids, or upload a file.

flatVocabParam.name: hts_isolate_set_a
flatVocabParam.help: Choose comparators from the list of strains.

flatVocabParam.name: hts_isolate_set_b
flatVocabParam.help: Choose comparators from the list of strains.
